chapterTitle: Net Present Value and Other Investment Criteria

columns.text:
An expected rate of return of the project is defined by its internal rate of return.

Now, let's see the formula for the internal rate of return which we denote with $IRR$

$$\begin{align*}
0&=-I+\frac{CF}{IRR}\\[12pt]
I&=\frac{CF}{IRR}\\[12pt]
I \times IRR&= CF\\[12pt]
IRR&=\frac{CF}{I}
\end{align*}$$
